alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 2:39PM CDT until March 26 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Total accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Northwest winds gusting as high as 45 MPH this afternoon. * WHERE...Cheyenne County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
